info.description:
This is a collection of APIs to provide Catering Information

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/catering`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Catering

apiKey.name: apikey
apiKey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

sourceSystemParam.name: source_system
sourceSystemParam.description:
Name of the Catering System:
 * `SWZD` - Suite Wizard

startDateTimeParam.name: start_date_time
startDateTimeParam.description: Calendar start date and time for transactions. "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm". Must be within 24 hours of end_date_time.

endDateTimeParam.name: end_date_time
endDateTimeParam.description: Calendar end date and time for transactions. "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm". Must be within 24 hours of start_date_time.

pageParam.name: page
pageParam.description: Page number of result set. Default 1

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of rows in each page to return. Default 50

rawParam.name: raw
rawParam.description: Flag used to determine if the data is direct from the source system, unconformed or not

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

source_system.description: Identifier of the source POS system

order_status.description: Status of the Order (OPEN, CLOSED, NEW, PENDING, HOLD, VIEWED)

order_total_at_closing.description: Total od the Order when it is closed

order_detail_id.description: System Identifier of the Order Item

unit_price.description: Per Unit Price of the Order Item

quantity.description: Quantity of the Item on the Order

total_price.description: Total Price of the Order Item

gl_code.description: Internal Ledger Code for the Item

gl_code_description.description: Description of the Ledger Code for the Item

gl_code_percent_of_item.description: The percentage of the Item associated to the Ledger Code

last_update_date.description: Date-Time the records was last updated
